history.proof: intros n l t. revert n l. intros n l Hlen Hin. destruct l. + shelve. + destruct n. * shelve. * simpl in Hlen. inversion Hlen. shelve.

forall (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> In t (all_cover_aux l n) -> cover l t

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive cover : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover _%list_scope Arguments cover_node (_ _)%list_scope
all_cover_aux = fix all_cover_aux (l : list (btree A)) (n : nat) {struct n} : list (btree A) := match n with | 0 => nil | S n1 => flat_map (fun l1 : list (btree A) => match l1 with | nil => nil | a :: nil => a :: nil | a :: b :: l2 => all_cover_aux (node a b :: l2) n1 end) (all_permutations l) end : list (btree A) -> nat -> list (btree A) Arguments all_cover_aux _%list_scope _%nat_scope
leaf : forall A : Type, A -> btree A
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A cover_inv_leaf_aux : forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = leaf a :: nil |- Type]
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
cover_not_nil : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
cover_permutation : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
one_cover_ex : forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
cover_number_of_nodes : forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> number_of_nodes t = fold_left (fun (x : nat) (y : btree A) => x + number_of_nodes y) l 0 + Init.Nat.pred (length l)
cover_inv_leaf : forall (a : A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (leaf a) -> l = leaf a :: nil
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t
frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (n : nat) (m : list A), In (a, n) (frequency_list eqA_dec m) -> In a m
cover_in_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inb_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
all_leaves_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), In a (all_leaves t) -> inb (leaf a) t
all_leaves_in : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), inb (leaf a) t -> In a (all_leaves t)
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
Inductive inb (A : Type) : btree A -> btree A -> Prop := inleaf : forall t : btree A, inb t t | innodeL : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2) | innodeR : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2) Arguments inb [A]%type_scope Arguments inleaf _%type_scope Arguments innodeL _%type_scope Arguments innodeR _%type_scope
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
inleaf : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), inb t t
cover_cons_l : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover (t2 :: l1) (node t2 t1)
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
all_leaves_unique : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), ulist (all_leaves t) -> distinct_leaves t
all_leaves_ulist : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> ulist (all_leaves t)

``` 
intros n l t. revert n l. induction t using cover_sind.
- intros n l Hlen Hin. destruct l.
  + contradiction.
  + simpl. inversion Hin; subst. apply cover_one.
- intros n l Hlen Hin. destruct n.
  + simpl in Hlen. inversion Hlen.
  + simpl in *. apply cover_inv_app_aux in H as [Hl | [l1 [l2 [[Hc1 Hc2] Hperm]]]].
    * rewrite Hl. apply cover_one.
    * rewrite Hl. apply cover_cons_l. apply IHt2 with (n:=n) in Hl.
      { apply Hl. }
      { apply Hperm. }
    * apply perm_surject_length in Hperm. congruence.
```

original: intros n l t. revert n l. induction t using cover_sind. - intros n l Hlen Hin. destruct l. + contradiction. + simpl. inversion Hin; subst. apply cover_one. - intros n l Hlen Hin. destruct n. + simpl in Hlen. inversion Hlen. + simpl in *. apply cover_inv_app_aux in H as [Hl | [l1 [l2 [[Hc1 Hc2] Hperm]]]]. * rewrite Hl. apply cover_one. * rewrite Hl. apply cover_cons_l. apply IHt2 with (n:=n) in Hl. { apply Hl. } { apply Hperm. } * apply perm_surject_length in Hperm. congruence.
